REM ***** BASIC ***** option explicit
Dim sSQL1 AS String,sSQL2 AS String Dim vSQLArray AS Variant
Sub Formular_init() GlobalScope.BasicLibraries.LoadLibrary("ALADIN") init_Form_Personaldaten() init_Form_Steuerung() init_List_Personalauswahl() End Sub
Sub init_Form_Personaldaten() sSQL1="SELECT * FROM "& sPersonal &" WHERE PersonalID=:c" oForm_Personaldaten.DataSourceName=sDataSource oForm_Personaldaten.NavigationBarMode=0 oForm_Personaldaten.CommandType=2 oForm_Personaldaten.Command=sSQL1 oForm_Personaldaten.Cycle=1 oForm_Personaldaten.AllowInserts=false End Sub
Sub init_Form_Steuerung() sSQL1="SELECT * FROM Steuerung WHERE ClientID="& iClientID oForm_Steuerung.DataSourceName=sDataSource oForm_Steuerung.NavigationBarMode=0 oForm_Steuerung.CommandType=2 oForm_Steuerung.Command=sSQL1 oForm_Steuerung.Cycle=1 oForm_Steuerung.AllowInserts=false End Sub
Sub init_List_Personalauswahl() vSQLArray=Array("SELECT DISTINCT "&_ "CONCAT(t1.Name1,', ',t1.Vorname,' --> ',t1.Ort) AS Name,"&_ "t1.PersonalID FROM "& sPersonal &" AS t1 ORDER BY t1.Name1 ASC") oList_Personalauswahl.ListSourceType=4 oList_Personalauswahl.ListSource=vSQLArray End Sub
